review: It's just ok. No HBO Go until Spring 2015 is a bummer, and the tv ads are deceiving...it looks like you just plug it in without a power source. That is not really the case. My older Roku works better and has more content. I was actually disappointed, but will keep the Fire TV Stick.
author: Melissa J. Horton

review: I LOVE THIS. I never had Google Chromecast, but I'm glad that this works with Amazon Prime. Very easy to set up and use. Very easy to get the Netflix and Hulu apps and then navigate with the remote. Also very easy to use my Samsung Galaxy S4 as a remote (when I downloaded the fire TV app). One complaint I have is regarding searching for TV or movies. When searching with the stick, sometimes it does not come up, so I have to go to the website on a computer to find what I need and then add it to my watchlist. E.g., I searched for Torchwood using the stick and it didn't come up. So I went to my computer and found it and added it to my watchlist. I don't know why it didn't come up with I used the stick to search.
